mapper.insert: INSERT INTO capita_income (yr_dt, cty_nm, unit, val) VALUES (#{yr_dt}, #{cty_nm}, #{unit}, #{val}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE yr_dt = #{yr_dt}, cty_nm = #{cty_nm}
INSERT INTO gni_capita (yr_dt, unit, gdi_val, gni_val) VALUES (#{yr_dt}, #{unit}, #{gdi_val}, #{gni_val}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE yr_dt = #{yr_dt}
INSERT INTO gini_cfcnt (yr_dt, val) VALUES (#{yr_dt}, #{val}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE yr_dt = #{yr_dt}
INSERT INTO min_pay (yr_dt, unit, val) VALUES (#{yrDt}, #{unit}, #{val}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE yr_dt = #{yr_dt}
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(yr_dt) AS yr_dt FROM capita_income
SELECT MAX(yr_dt) AS yr_dt FROM gni_capita
SELECT MAX(yr_dt) AS yr_dt FROM gini_cfcnt
SELECT MAX(yr_dt) AS yrDt FROM min_pay
